name: Recon
desc: Information gathering — ports, services, subdomains, URLs, technologies.

name: OSINT
desc: Collect public data like emails, usernames, social exposure, intelligence.

name: Vulnerability
desc: Scan targets for weaknesses and CVEs automatically.

name: Web App
desc: Website security testing — fuzzing, SQLi, scanning, enumeration.

name: Red Team
desc: Post-exploitation, lateral movement, C2, privilege escalation.

name: Passwords
desc: Password cracking, brute force, hash recovery tools.

name: Cloud
desc: AWS, Azure, GCP security auditing & exploitation.

name: Mobile
desc: Android/iOS security testing, reversing & dynamic analysis.

name: DFIR
desc: Incident response, logs, memory forensics, investigation.

name: Network
desc: Packet capture, sniffing, MITM, protocol analysis.

name: ICS
desc: Industrial control system testing & SCADA analysis.

name: TI
desc: Threat intelligence platforms, IOCs, CTI operations.
